strapiPost.title: Arkansas Cinema Society To Host Film Development Conference At Thaden School
strapiPost.content:
The Arkansas Cinema Society (ACS) is hosting its first film development conference this weekend at Thaden School in Bentonville. 

  • Film and fun: At the conference, there will be screenings of “Jockey” and “Loving,” happy hours, and a full day of in-depth discussions and workshops on the best practices in pre-production with industry experts.
  • Go to learn: The writers, directors, and producers for both films will be presenting different workshops and participating in Q&A sessions over the weekend. Full weekend passes are available, workshop day passes are available, as are tickets for individual workshops and screenings. 

For more information and tickets, click HERE.
